full_output.summary: As a third-year CSE student with a strong focus on cloud computing and an open minor in banking and finance, I offer a unique combination of technical and financial expertise. Over the years, my hands-on experience with advanced JavaScript and Java has fueled my enthusiasm to explore the dynamic field of technology. I am eager to work on projects involving data, testing, and cloud services. With strong communication and analytical skills, I am ready to contribute to innovative and impactful projects, leveraging my excellent verbal skills to maintain relevance in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. I am currently seeking an internship opportunity to further develop my skills and gain practical experience in the industry.

certifications.title: IBM Cloud Essentional Application Development using Microservices and Serverles
Building Scalable Java Microservices with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud

projects.name: Diet plan
projects.description: Developed a Python script for personalized meal plans based on sport and gender, utilizing a predefined food database for quick nutrition calculations. Implemented functions for calculating meal nutrition and viewing the food database, with a user-friendly menu for easy navigation and interaction. Designed prompts for personal info input with validation for gender and sport, and included data visualization for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Password Generator and Tester
projects.description: Developed a Java-based application with a robust password generator and tester for enhanced online security. Implemented a GUI using Swing and java.awt, adhering to best practices for maintainability and error handling. Led a team to create essential classes: PasswordGenerator, PasswordTester, and PasswordGeneratorUI.

projects.name: AWS VPC Setup with Internet Gateway and NAT Gateway
projects.description: Created a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) in AWS with public and private subnets, Internet Gateway, and NAT Gateway in a single availability zone. Configured route tables for proper routing and ensured secure traffic management between subnets. Leveraged AWS Management Console to design a robust and scalable network infrastructure.

full_output.name: AKMAL MOHAMMED YASHEEN
